Enums/RxPullToRefreshAnimationType.html#.name: custom(duration:delay:springDamping:initialSpringVelocity:options:)
Enums/RxPullToRefreshAnimationType.html#.abstract: A customizable animation preset. See the Apple doc for more information.

Enums/RxPullToRefreshState.html#/c:@M@Rx.name: initial
Enums/RxPullToRefreshState.html#/c:@M@Rx.abstract: A state indicating that a view is not being dragged by user and not scrolling.

Enums/RxPullToRefreshState.html#/c:@M@Rx.name: pulling
Enums/RxPullToRefreshState.html#/c:@M@Rx.abstract: A state indicating that a view is being dragged by user.

Enums/RxPullToRefreshState.html#/c:@M@Rx.name: overThreshold
Enums/RxPullToRefreshState.html#/c:@M@Rx.abstract: A state indicating that user is dragging a view and an offset is over threshold.

Enums/RxPullToRefreshState.html#/c:@M@Rx.name: loading
Enums/RxPullToRefreshState.html#/c:@M@Rx.abstract: A state indicating that user is stop dragging a view and an offset is moved to threshold.

Enums/RxPullToRefreshState.html#/c:@M@Rx.name: finished
Enums/RxPullToRefreshState.html#/c:@M@Rx.abstract: A state indicating that loading is finished. ⚠️To change state to RxPullToRefreshState.finish, you need to explicitly call UIScrollView.endAllRefreshing or RxPullToRefresh.endRefreshing.

Enums/RxPullToRefreshState.html#/c:@M@Rx.name: failed
Enums/RxPullToRefreshState.html#/c:@M@Rx.abstract: A state indicating that loading is failed. ⚠️To change state to RxPullToRefreshState.failed, you need to explicitly call UIScrollView.endAllRefreshing or RxPullToRefresh.endAllRefreshing.

Enums/RxPullToRefreshState.html#/c:@M@Rx.name: backing
Enums/RxPullToRefreshState.html#/c:@M@Rx.abstract: A state indicating that a view is backing to a default offset.

Enums/RxPullToRefreshPosition.html.name: RxPullToRefreshPosition
Enums/RxPullToRefreshPosition.html.abstract: An Enumerations indicating the position of a RxPullToRefresh object.

Enums/RxPullToRefreshAnimationType.html.name: RxPullToRefreshAnimationType
Enums/RxPullToRefreshAnimationType.html.abstract: An enumeration for animation presets indicating duration and velocity when loading and backing.

Classes/RxPullToRefreshExtensionProxy.ht.name: addPullToRefresh(_:)
Classes/RxPullToRefreshExtensionProxy.ht.abstract: A function to add a RxPullToRefresh object to a UIScrollView.

Classes/RxPullToRefreshExtensionProxy.ht.name: getPullToRefresh(at:)
Classes/RxPullToRefreshExtensionProxy.ht.abstract: A function to get a RxPullToRefresh object placed at a specific position.

Classes/RxPullToRefreshExtensionProxy.ht.name: removePullToRefresh(at:)
Classes/RxPullToRefreshExtensionProxy.ht.abstract: A function to remove a RxPullToRefresh object placed at a specific position.

Classes/RxPullToRefreshExtensionProxy.ht.name: removeAllPullToRefresh()
Classes/RxPullToRefreshExtensionProxy.ht.abstract: A function to remove all RxPullToRefresh objects.

Classes/RxPullToRefreshExtensionProxy.ht.name: startRefreshing(at:)
Classes/RxPullToRefreshExtensionProxy.ht.abstract: A function to start refreshing a RxPullToRefresh object placed at a specific position.

Classes/RxPullToRefreshExtensionProxy.ht.name: endRefreshing(at:)
Classes/RxPullToRefreshExtensionProxy.ht.abstract: A function to end refreshing a RxPullToRefresh object placed at a specific position.

Classes/RxPullToRefreshExtensionProxy.ht.name: failRefreshing(at:)
Classes/RxPullToRefreshExtensionProxy.ht.abstract: A function to fail refreshing a RxPullToRefresh object placed at a specific position.

Classes/RxPullToRefreshExtensionProxy.ht.name: endAllRefreshing()
Classes/RxPullToRefreshExtensionProxy.ht.abstract: A function to end refreshing all RxPullToRefresh objects.

Protocols/RxPullToRefreshDelegate.html#/.name: action(state:progress:scroll:)
Protocols/RxPullToRefreshDelegate.html#/.abstract: A delegate method that called each time a user performs an action.

Protocols/RxPullToRefreshDelegate.html.name: RxPullToRefreshDelegate
Protocols/RxPullToRefreshDelegate.html.abstract: The interface for handling actions in a RxPullToRefresh object.

Classes/RxPullToRefreshView.html#/c:@M@R.name: canLoadMore
Classes/RxPullToRefreshView.html#/c:@M@R.abstract: A Boolean value indicating whether the view can load more content.

Classes/RxPullToRefreshView.html#/c:@M@R.name: action(state:progress:scroll:)
Classes/RxPullToRefreshView.html#/c:@M@R.abstract: A function that called each time a user performs an action.

Classes/RxPullToRefresh.html#/s:15RxPull.name: position
Classes/RxPullToRefresh.html#/s:15RxPull.abstract: A RxPullToRefreshPosition value indicating where placed at.

Classes/RxPullToRefresh.html#/s:15RxPull.name: waitDurationOnFailure
Classes/RxPullToRefresh.html#/s:15RxPull.abstract: A TimeInterval value indicating the duration to display an error on failure.

Classes/RxPullToRefresh.html#/s:15RxPull.name: shouldStartLoadingWhileDragging
Classes/RxPullToRefresh.html#/s:15RxPull.abstract: A Boolean value indicating whether to start loading while dragging. If set to false, loading starts after the user finishes dragging.

Classes/RxPullToRefresh.html#/c:@M@RxPul.name: isDragging
Classes/RxPullToRefresh.html#/c:@M@RxPul.abstract: A Boolean value indicating whether a scroll view is being dragged.

Classes/RxPullToRefresh.html#/c:@M@RxPul.name: isEnabled
Classes/RxPullToRefresh.html#/c:@M@RxPul.abstract: A Boolean value indicating whether a RxPullToRefresh object is enabled. If set to false, a RxPullToRefresh object will not be displayed regardless of whether a data source exists or not.

Classes/RxPullToRefresh.html#/c:@M@RxPul.name: canLoadMore
Classes/RxPullToRefresh.html#/c:@M@RxPul.abstract: A Boolean value indicating whether RxPullToRefresh can load more content. If set to false, the text No Content will be displayed by default.

Classes/RxPullToRefresh.html#/c:@M@RxPul.name: progressRate
Classes/RxPullToRefresh.html#/c:@M@RxPul.abstract: A pulling rate of a RxPullToRefreshState object

Classes/RxPullToRefresh.html#/c:@M@RxPul.name: state
Classes/RxPullToRefresh.html#/c:@M@RxPul.abstract: A RxPullToRefreshState value indicating a pulling state

Classes/RxPullToRefresh.html#/s:15RxPull.name: refreshView
Classes/RxPullToRefresh.html#/s:15RxPull.abstract: A customizable UIView which added to a header or a footer.

Classes/RxPullToRefreshView.html.name: RxPullToRefreshView
Classes/RxPullToRefreshView.html.abstract: A base class to customize a refresh view conforming to RxPullToRefreshAnimatable.
